Dear All,

Please find attached the receiving Excel file and photographs for the Flou bedding and furniture delivered to the Palm on 14 August. The file is also attached to this email for ease of reference.

All items were received in good order. A few cartons arrived slightly soiled/crushed; however, the contents were inspected and found to be undamaged.

Best regards,
